transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir, mai na ek haan ek minute aap line pe rahiyega mai aapke na baat kara deti hu arrange kara isko call ek minute.
Customer: Lekin mai ab nikal gaya hu bazaar nikal gaya hu friend.
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir aap bahar aa gaye hai kya?
Customer: Haan bazaar nikal gaya friend. Call karo na.
Executive: Accha mujhe suniye suniye mujhe bas khali aap se ye bolna tha jo aapke product ka correction hai wo hum matlab hamari team yani jo aapke account manager hai wahi karenge. To customer care pe jo aapne call kara tha na unka concern waha pe khula hua hai wo close kar de baki aap connect humse regular rakhiye kyuki aapko hum call to karte hai lekin aapki taraf se time bahut kam milta hai system pe discussion ke liye. To agar aap system pe discussion karke apne product ek bar correct kara lenge to aapke pass iske product ki leads aayegi kyuki isme bahut jyada competition wala issue nahi hai isme. Isme aapke aisa bhi nahi hai ki bahut se star chala rahe hai leaders chala rahe hai to leads aapko nahi mil paye aisa wala problem bhi nahi hai. Leads aapko mil jayengi lekin ye hai ki aap regular ek hafte me ek bar connect hamare sath kariye to aapka ye issue jo hai wo dhire dhire apne aap resolve ho jayega leads wala jo problem hai aapko.
Customer: Haan to hatwana padega kyuki kaam hi nahi mil raha hai friend baithe rehte hai to lead acchi aa nahi rahi ho lead ja rahi hai.
Executive: Haan to pichli bar bhi sir aapko humne kiya tha bahut call lekin aapne call koi answer nahi kara tha is wajah to to pichli bar bhi resolve nahi ho paya tha.
Customer: Ek ek week me jo bonus wali lead hai na wahi use kar pate hai 30 lead to yuhi ja rahi hai.
Executive: Haan to aapko uske liye guidance ke liye aapko thoda sa time dena padega mai abhi na ek group bhi bana deti hu jisme aapka ye number aur mai aur Kritika ji aur jo hamari head hai wo rahengi. To aapko jaise jo bhi concerns hai to aap waha pe bhi dal sakte ho jo buyleads ka problem hai. Taki kyuki customer care pe aap raise karte hai na to wo team hume hi bolti hai connect karne ke liye account manager ka access jo hai wo Kritika aur hamare pass hi rehta hai isliye. To mai aap se yahi bol rahi hu ki aap apna time kal ka bata do kis time aap connect karoge.
Customer: To aap abhi ek kaam karo na ab sahi kar do jo hai wo mai aapko bol deta hu jo chize hatwani hai wo hata dijiye. Haan dusri jo sahi karna hai wo kar dena.
Executive: Haan bata dena sahi kar dena.
Customer: Haan isme aapki aapki help sahi hogi aur baki wo jo hai customer care pe concern raise aapka direct call jo gaya tha wo close kar de rahi hu mai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai koi baat nahi.
Executive: Hai na aur aapko mai aapko mai group bana rahi hu to usme aap time bata do kis time aap free rahoge to hum corrections aap se baat karke karwa lenge ye.
Customer: Subah 11 baje call kar lena pehle to.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai 11 baje aapko call karti hu aur abhi mai group bana rahi hu aapke number add karke.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads.

- Unable to use bonus leads effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to correct product details.

- Executive will create a group for communication.

- Customer care concern will be closed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 11 AM next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product correction, group
